name: Meet the <1>Cutefish</1>
motto: Focus on simplicity, beauty and practicality

apps.title: Awesome Apps
apps.desc: We have developed a special applications to ensure that users experience an awesome UI / UX experience in their daily use.

desktop.title: Cutefish Desktop
desktop.desc: Cutefish desktop environment is an efficient, beautiful, and modern desktop environment built using Qt Quick and some KDE basic frameworks.

downloads.title: Download CutefishOS or flavours of it

cutefish.title: CutefishOS
cutefish.desc: CutefishOS is Debian based distro, and it is best OS for Cutefish DE.

ubuntu.title: Cutefish DE with Ubuntu
ubuntu.desc: Ubuntu is Debian based, easy to use distro. Try out Cutefish DE with Ubuntu.

manjaro.title: Cutefish DE with Manjaro
manjaro.desc: Manjaro is Arch based, easy to use distro. Try out Cutefish DE with Manjaro.
